website_summaries.verdict: Extra-large microwave with families in mind, this feature-heavy machine includes options to defrost and soften as well as cook.
pros: Scratch-resistant glass door and brushed stainless steel exterior go with any décor
Smart buttons are great for those who don't want to guess how long to cook basic foods, such as popcorn
cons: Will continue to beep when the food is done cooking until food is taken out
Too big and heavy to fit some microwave carts

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Microwaves ZSMC1842CS Sharp 1,100W Countertop Microwave Oven, 1.8 Cubic Foot, Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product in February 2019. Today is 4/15/2020. Only 14 months passed and this microwave died today. I paid close to $170. Not worth the money. Not a good quality product from Sharp. I would not recommend this to anyone. Update 4/16/2020: I have reached out to Sharp customer support. Waiting to see what they do. Update 4/26/2020: I received a new unit from Sharp. So far working good. Thanks to Sharp customer support for quick resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Abhijit Bhattacharya

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love the Sharp brand and have had microwaves that lasted...oh, wait, it's still working after 17 years of constant use. The first unit I got had an intermittent problem with heat regulation so I sent it back. Amazon was, as usual, great at customer service and had a new unit at my door in 4 days. Thank you, Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a microwave.... But, yes ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a microwave....But, yes it works perfectly as described. It replaced an older Samsung carousel that we had for about, I think about 12 yrs, which was way longer then we expected. Never had a problem with that one, so we decided to stay with Samsung. Can’t go wrong for the money. AND yes, I’m very frugal and shopped around every site on the web u can think of and of course, AS USUAL, end up buying it on Amazon...!!!....I’m so brainwashed and a long time Amazonion...
customer_reviews.author: MDAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with all the right buttons.
customer_reviews.text: It took me almost an hour to get the plastic wrap off the microwave when unpacking it. Not sure why it has to be sealed so tight. Fits 9x13 pans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: This model is very similar to the 20-year-old Sharp I had to replace. There are some improvements that I appreciate (I really like the 30-second start button; the sensor cook/reheat is great), some that I'm getting used to (having to push 'power' and then the time and then start - if you don't and you just push 5, you get five minutes instead of the 5 seconds you wanted), and one feature I loathe (the incessant beeping when done - once, twice, maybe even three times in 5 minutes would be useful, but it NEVER stops - ugh). I've been using the new Sharp for a couple of months now, and overall I am very pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: L. G. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Research this model and read comments. Had to send first one back.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS. The first one stopped working within days and the second one last 6 months. The same thing happened with both....while heating something it just shut off entirely and wouldn't power up at all, like it wasn't even plugged in. Both times I smelled what seemed like electrical wires burning. I read the reviews for this product and saw some others had an issue just like this and figured "oh well it's such a small percentage it will be fine". Obviously I was wrong. Lesson learned. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy a microwave from Sharp again. ...
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a microwave from Sharp again. It's day 10 or so of a replacement under warranty because it's started producing a burning electrical smell. Their customer service is polite but completely incompetent. Unreturned calls, incorrect addresses, etc. etc. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: LRod

customer_reviews.title: defective keypad - poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The keypad was defective out of the box. Up until this time I have always had Sharp microwave ovens. However I am very disappointed the the poor quality control and I will be looking at other brands. I am returning this turkey.
customer_reviews.author: batray

customer_reviews.title: Economical and works great.  Does not have a lot of high end features you probably won't use anyway.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave works fine. It is a good size and does the job. As I reviewed microwave ovens, I learned of all sorts of wonderful features available to facilitate better cooking with these appliances. This model has a few of those features but not as many as top of the line products. It was tempting to go for the feature rich microwaves. However I think most of us will just use a microwave to heat or re-reheat food regardless of the bells and whistles available. That's all I've used this one for, and it works great for that. I doubt that I will ever use it as a PRIMARY cooking appliance, and I'm glad I choose this relatively economical model.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrives Not Working!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived, I did everything I was supposed to do prior to using. The microwave itself works. The turntable does not work. Not shipping back too much of a hassle, my loss. I most definitely would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Proudveteran

customer_reviews.title: It’s a microwave.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a microwave. I use it to microwave stuff. I open the door, put stuff in it and hit a couple of buttons. It works and then I pull my stuff out all steamy hot. It was inexpensive, it arrived quickly and it’s easy to use. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: This Sharp is sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th microwave and my 4th Sharp. Wouldn't buy any other brand. They have all worked very well for many years. This one is small enough not to take over the entire counter but large enough to reheat a 9" x 11" casserole. It has a lot more choices in operating modes than the 1st Sharp I owned, and takes a bit longer to figure out, but it does an excellent job. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoast!

customer_reviews.title: Only 2 yrs old Died but had issues since purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd microwave they sent me. This one would cut itself off if you ran it for 5 minutes and you had to wait for it to decide to work again. Now after 2 yrs it started sparking all on its own without me even using it. Heard noise in kitchen & when I went in to see what it was, found microwave was turning itself on and off and sparking. Would not shut off, so I unplugged it immediately. It decided to work again after a day, but then shut off om middle of cooking. Would not come back on without sparking on and off. It is in trash now. Ha
customer_reviews.author: Florida fan girl

customer_reviews.title: Couple little things I don't like about it
customer_reviews.text: Performance wise this works as it should. Couple little things I don't like about it.. it's really loud after owning for about a year. Also the button to open the door is touchy. If you don't press it directly in the center, the door won't open. Nothing so bad that I ever thought about sending it back, but I probably wouldn't order another one when this one dies.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Awful...never again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and it sparked and collected moisture between the windows in the door. Sent it back. Received another on a Saturday and was sending it back on Monday. It overheated after 10 minutes of use and stopped working completely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Alkema

customer_reviews.title: Overheats and shuts off...
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a piece of junk since the day I bought it. As others have noted, it overheats after 4-5 minutes and shuts off...you can't even finish a batch of bacon!! Then you have to wait a few minutes for it to kick back on...but it'll just do it again after 4-5 minutes. I called the company shortly after I bought this thing and all they could tell me was to un-plug it for 5 minutes and that would "reset" something...but that never worked. So frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement!
customer_reviews.text: After over a decade and with a spark and whiff of ozone, the old microwave gave up the ghost. Found this Sharp countertop with a very good capacity and adjustable power output that had almost the exact same inside dimensions as the old one. Have it it for over a month and it has worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Elston

customer_reviews.title: Microwave quit two months after the warranty ended.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted less than eight months. The last time I used it I heard time I used it I heard a loud pop and smelled hot electronics. The timer and carousel work but it won't cook. This happened two and a half months after the warranty ended.
customer_reviews.author: Norman G Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Single stage cooking only.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed that it does not have 2 stage cooking as did my old Sharp Microwave. I cook most things with first on high and then finish at 50%. It is a real pain to have to go back and reenter the 50% portion of the cooking after the full power portion is done!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cone

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and quiet operation. The platter will even turn a 9 x 13 casserole dish without hitting the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Sharp makes the best, and most of the microwaves sold under other ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp makes the best, and most of the microwaves sold under other names. This is better than the five year old one it replaced. The changes in the touchpad are better in some respects, and a bit of a challenge in others. Overall I would say they are moving in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Craig E. Dupler

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MICROWAVE AND DO NOT BUY FROM THIS VENDOR...
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of CRAP!!!! LESS THAN A YEAR AND IT BLOWS A FUSE. IT'S USELESS. IT IS TOO HEAVY FOR ME TO LIFT AND BOX AND RETURN. At first, I could not microwave for longer than 6 minutes. And it was always off balance so I had to put a matchbook under one end.
customer_reviews.author: I.m.shopper

customer_reviews.title: Unit got very hot and shut itself down
customer_reviews.text: Amazon purchased; no complaints until 11 months later it began to shut itself down after getting very hot in one spot on the right rear corner on the top of the set. Fearing a fire hazard, we contacted Sharp and they're replacing it with a comparable model. Customer service was fine. Hopefully the new set doesn't have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Ravitz

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This microwave was a breeze to install it works great and it looks awesome the delivery was fast and the packaging was excellent so it arived safe and sound and it's working great in my kitchen right now
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Very Large Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for those large dishes (we're a family of five). The steam sensor works great; food is hot but not over-done. Easy to figure out without directions. Repeated beeping noise if food is left in it after a few minutes, which is a good reminder. Not a loud intrusive beep either, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: ASkal

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but "+30 seconds" button is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but setting the cook time is harder than on other models. For example, to set cook time of 3 minutes 30 seconds on other models, simply press "3" for express cook, then press "+30". But on this model, the "+30 seconds" button only works if it's the only button you push. So your options are: - Press "+30" seven times to get to 3 minutes 30 seconds, or - Press "Power" - "3" - "3" - "0" - "Start" -- (which is odd because you have to press "Power" to set the cook time and because "Start" is labeled "Start +30" but in this case it doesn't "+30".)
customer_reviews.author: Busy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this Microwave. It's kicks off after 7 plus minutes at high heat after a few minutes it come back on. Both bake patato and steam vegetables are not cooked as well as out old microwave. This unit is just not as good and as advertized ready to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I have always held Sharp products in high regard so I purchased a Sharp microwave (R-559YW) for my daughter when hers died. The turntable feature (a Sharp hallmark) stopped working - it happens. Since it was still under warranty, I called Sharp customer service who walked me through a short troubleshooting exercise to determine the accuracy of my complaint. They then shipped me a brand new replacement microwave. I love that they still stand behind their products!
customer_reviews.author: hueydriverduke24

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Just had another Sharp microwave die after 25 years so went for another Sharp and I wasn't diissappointed.This unit is quite and fast to reheat with the reheat button. That was one thing I loved about my old Sharp and they seemed to have improved on it. Popcorn button worked perfectly also. The soften button seemed to melt the butter so I would recommend to just give it 15 to 20 seconds. Would suggest this model to anyone looking for a microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Chuly

customer_reviews.title: Arcing and burn smell, only 11 months old
customer_reviews.text: I loved my microwave and all it accomplished for my family, but today almost 11 months later my microwave is not working. I put a cup of coffee in and turned it on, something arced and when I stopped it i smelled a burning smell. There was a small burn hole between the door and the frame of the microwave on both sides( the door and the frame) where there is the appearance of metal surface. Now Im going to have to buy a new microwave. It should have lasted more than 11 months. Really disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as my last one
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the 30 seconds button does not add after full minutes like my old one did. I was used to putting 6 1/2 minutes. It works well for only 30 seconds, or you can press the 30 seconds for a few minutes, but not six minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Micro
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace a Jenn Air oven/micro combo build in,fit perfect. This is a very nice microwave would recommend this to anyone, also VERY...VERY... QUIET cannot hear it running and that is a plus....
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Very large for any space.
customer_reviews.text: I Just unpacked it. It is huge! I should have paid more attention to the dimensions. I dont know where I am going to put it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa B.

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: this is a replacement for a similar model that suddenly died after twenty years plus or minus. works well and I have no complaints at all. more quiet than previous model and a little larger interior though outside its the same size. fits a plate of food (i cook for one only) easily, heats evenly and predictably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great microwave. It heats food and liquids fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave. It heats food and liquids fast. I had built an old GE into my cabinets and was replacing it after 19 years of use. The only issue I appear to be having is the +30 sec doesnt add 30 sec....but will run for 30 sec if you push that button first. Overall, great value for this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Don W.

customer_reviews.title: its a great mirco
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't read through to find out how to lower the wattage so i don't burn the popcorn
customer_reviews.author: Edna G.

customer_reviews.title: I liked this microwave for the first 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this microwave for the first 3 months. In month 4 the door started to not latch unless you closed from the top. In month 5 it failed to close properly at all and stopped working. I am hoping for a refund/exchange, but I definitely would not recommend this product until I have tried another of the same model and se if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. My old Sharp lasted over 15 years
customer_reviews.text: One year and one month after purchase, it died! Very disappointed. My old Sharp lasted over 15 years. guess that's what happens when everything gets outsourced to China-quality goes to hell. Waiting today to see if they will honor warranty, not holding my breath. Will not buy another Sharp product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Lowery

customer_reviews.title: We cannot recommend this
customer_reviews.text: We are having the same problem others have mentioned. When cooking items for more than 5 or 6 minutes the unit shut down, no display. After 5 or 10 minutes it comes to life again displaying O. Also the outside top and right side of the unit gets very hot to the touch. We cannot recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I love this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave. Amazon had a good price too. However when it arrived I apparently had a lemon. The light inside stayed on. The start button wouldn't engage. Tried several ways to "reboot" (unplugged, switched outlets, etc.) but still broken. The hassle of reboxing and returning wasn't worth it. Bougnt a new from Walmart with stainless steel rather than white for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this product. It generally does the job but frequently will shut down and have to be restarted. This is very common if you attempt to microwave a second bag of popcorn right after completing the first bag. Shuts off completely and is dark for a minute or two until it cools down.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Fits very nicely in our kitchen and large enough to hold our biggest casserole or pyrex dish.
customer_reviews.author: KathyandTim

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great price, shipped to my door. This microwave is easy to operate. Nice features. Perfect size, powerful. Exactly what I would have driven around to several stores, hoping to find, then haul it home and much more costly.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Sharp Microwave. (First one lasted twelve years.) Size is perfect. More feature rich than we need. Performs perfectly. Four stars instead of five because we can't program for anything less than 30 seconds. We need to be able to put something in for ten or fifteen seconds. Instead we have to use the "Add 30 Seconds" button and stand there to stop it in fifteen seconds.
customer_reviews.author: KC Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Not the best experience.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 8 months ago and the interior bulb already burned out. When using the potato option it will completely stop functioning (internal circuit breaker?) for about an hour. Not the best experience.
customer_reviews.author: PeterK

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave in Jan 2018, and used it for a back up microwave. It died last week. Just stopped cooking suddenly. We didn't use this microwave daily, and only used it periodically. I would have expected it to last a little longer! So, I probably won't buy a Sharp again.
customer_reviews.author: Maark Grafton

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We used it for everyday warming and cooking. Died 18 months to the day after I bought it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shareshoe

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a year and it doesn't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Palm Tree Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave but pulls alot of Electricty
customer_reviews.text: Great Microwave put pulls alot of electricity cant have the microwavw and the tv running at the same time cuz it'll jump the circut breaker
customer_reviews.author: Ever

customer_reviews.title: Failed, seems dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Same as others have posted - just hit the seven month mark, now shut down microwaving a frozen dinner for 5 minutes. Case is very hot on top right and right side. Not comfortable using a device that gets that hot, and obviously malfunctioning. Now I need how to figure out how to return it. UPDATE 7/31/17: While I can't recommend the product, Sharp customer service did a great job getting a replacement (similar product) sent to me without delay.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Too  Bad Sharp microwaves aren't what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Sharp microwave ovens. Back several years ago you couldn't wear them out. Since they started making them in China, the quality is no longer there. Now there's not much difference. That's too bad. I hate to see an excellent product prostituted for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and functional. Clean-looking, and easy to clean. My last microwave lasted over 25 years! It'll be awhile before i'll be able to add that to this review, but so far, i'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bodine

customer_reviews.title: Very disapponited!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back it sparked on the first day. Very disappointed, we had sharp for years what happened!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMOZONS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave. It is a bit large, but really is powerful. Heats evenly, and does the trick a lot faster than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: It cooks a mean potato
customer_reviews.text: Only decent oven we could find that fits our in-wall mount. Slightly less powerful than our Amana was, but cooks more evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hey

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This unit has exceeded my expectations. Powerful, and quiet! Yes, the keyboard would be better if lit, but after a few operations, it is very manageable. Great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: John Panco

customer_reviews.title: Great price, on time shipment
customer_reviews.text: Great price, on time shipment, works perfectly, cook setting features of more expensive units. Couldn't ask for a better buy. Jack the knave
customer_reviews.author: Jack the Knife

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the glass between the door panel steams up and you can't view your things while cooking
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: DIED AFTER 7 MONTHS !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2017, now in July 2017 it died! Major DISAPPOINTMENT! MAJOR! It began snapping and crackling and will not run...no longer usable. What a joke,only 7 months later! Remember when things were built to last?!? Thought we were investing in a reliable brand, we thought wrong apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya S.

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1/18/2018 and the thing popped and stopped heating tonight 11/3/2018
customer_reviews.author: harvey eddy

customer_reviews.title: Cooks okay no defrost
customer_reviews.text: Cooks the food okay but does not defrost very well
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: High Tech! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set-up...works grand and nice lines and shape to this microwave! 👍
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love the feature where it can soften items
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, waiting until I move. Love the feature where it can soften items, butter, cream cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Sto190

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one year and one month.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted one year and one month. It is just myself and my wife. No kids to play with melting army men. It made no noise. It just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Had my last one for 18 years and it was fantastic, this cooks even bettter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: it was to big for a cabinet. was an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: H.E.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of people can't figure out how to get varied numbers of time... Push "power" 1st, then ANY # you wish.. seconds, etc
customer_reviews.text: It's fine.. Don't know what more I could ask for...
customer_reviews.author: orion

customer_reviews.title: Very nice microwave, I love the size.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power. Great size. It will easily hold a dinner plate. Love it and would recommend it to anyone needing a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp MicroWave oven! Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is great!!! I had looked in stores locally, without success. The inside dimensions are perfect! The plate is larger than normal, which is what I wanted! The price is very reasonable also!
customer_reviews.author: regina m harnett

customer_reviews.title: Great mic
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Got this for the break room at my work. Looks sleek and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The new one is even better and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I always had Sharp built countertop microwaves. The one I am replacing lasted 15 years. The new one is even better and easy to operate. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wim Lindeboom

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Microwave Black
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a mid range mid grade microwave. would suggest getting the 1200 Watt unit fro faster warm ups
customer_reviews.author: PickyBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Our new microwave
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger and doesn't take as long to microwave leftovers and meals in general
customer_reviews.author: Lorin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Buy this microwave!
customer_reviews.text: The microwave arrived on time, perfect condition. This is exactly what I needed. I had checked the reviews, compared it with the other microwaves offered on Amazon. I didn't see any other microwave that would fit my needs and the price was in my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: To know who you are dealing with.you and your peopleare liars and thieves and need to have elder  abuse people get after you
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this brand for my microwaves. My first one was in 1974,it was an Amana radar Range and the Sharps are every bit as good as it was, maybe even better,I am looking forward to furthur dealings with AMAZON.com
customer_reviews.author: pat  underwood

customer_reviews.title: Big problem! The panel for operating controls is almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Big problem! The panel for operating controls is almost invisible because when the lights in the room are low it becomes impossible to see anything on the panel. The panel should have a background light source.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Power stops after 4-5 minutes. Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt purchase this again. You can only run it for 4-5 minutes before it stops. All power cuts out (no lights, no clock) and eventually it restores about 10-15 minutes later. I've tested that it's not the outlet - It's a faulty microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sharp Carousel Countertop Microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp Carousel Countertop Microwave Oven is really awesome. I love all the features and it is the perfect size. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this microwave
customer_reviews.text: As expected,I'm very happy with this microwave....A little bigger than I thought,but still a great microwave!
customer_reviews.author: jo v

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best microwave on the market,
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Burney Sr

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product especially the sensor part
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this product especially the sensor part. Makes my breakfast delightful with the beverage heating and baked potatoes come out just right, as I enjoy them. Glad I chose to stay with the same brand as I had before. Thank yoiu!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Flores

customer_reviews.title: Sharp makes a superb microwave. So I thought....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microwave! Arrived fast and loving it so far. Update Dec 2018 - only lasted 1 year and then stopped heating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Height Dimensions Are Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: The specifications say it is 12.5", but it is actually 13.25"! Because of the 3/4" discrepancy, I now have to pay a carpenter to adjust my space for the microwave. I meticulously checked the dimensions several times before ordering to avoid this very problem, so I'm NOT a happy camper. I ordered this unit because I had such good luck with an older model, and it seems to work well, but I did not need to incur extra expense to make it fit!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and convoluted in its operation
customer_reviews.text: The sharp countertop microwave oven ZR 559 YK is attractive, a little heavy and is not intuitive. It has a greater number of power options, but instead of pushing a specific option you must push the power button a number of times to reduce the power. I would much prefer to choose the power by just pushing a button. The 2nd problem is the specific buttons i.e. the popcorn button and other buttons for specific foods they are basically useless since they require a certain type of packaging or a specific weight of food. If I had my druthers I would choose a different microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Chessplay

customer_reviews.title: Control panel has stopped responding to input on most functions ...
customer_reviews.text: Control panel has stopped responding to input on most functions. Don't use the product that much so I am surprised it has failed in a little over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: So far this oven has performed as advertised. The first time I used it I was impressed by the sensor cooking of 3 large potatoes. They were cooked perfectly. Popcorn comes out with hardly any un-popped kernels. Reheating is a breeze. Have only had it since the end of March 2017 so will see about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the quick button features
customer_reviews.text: Works and runs well. No issues so far. Love the quick button features.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: over all dimensions are not as listed in description it ...
customer_reviews.text: over all dimensions are not as listed in description it is much larger it is 23 x17 x 13 luckily had the room. Purchased July 30 . September 14 bulb blew out have had microwaves for years never ever have I had a bulb blowout
customer_reviews.author: sue blatzheim

customer_reviews.title: Wore out after less than one year.  Not durable at all!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave in February 2018. The sensor pad doesn't work; all the numbers aren't working. The turntable is very slow. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We've had this just over a year. It shuts ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this just over a year. It shuts off sometimes when we cook 2 baked potatoes. After approximately 10 minutes it turns back on. Please let us know how to correct this.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Died after 19 months.
customer_reviews.text: I had this same model microwave that lasted for 17 years, so when it died, I wanted the same one again. Big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this microwave. It replaced a GE I've had for 7 years that I paid hundreds for. I don't need it for "fancy" cooking, just the basics: defrosting, reheating, pop corn. I do my "cooking" on my Wolf range. The microwave reheats evenly, which I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave for an out of state relative in April, 2018 and found out that the item quit working suddenly. No misuse of the oven or any electrical issue. It simply ceased working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: powerful and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, powerful and easy to operate. Large cooking area well lite. I hope this one lasts longer than other brands i have bought. New microwaves seem to last maybe 3 years or so. Thankfully I have an old Samsung 500W sandwich heater for emergencies, that thing must be 20 years old and recieved alot of use at my sons school and at my work. Lets try sharp :).
customer_reviews.author: LarrySmola

customer_reviews.title: This is a great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need a large microwave DON'T order this unit. It's large but my family loves it. Hax sll the festures you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Door latch broke two months after receiving it. No way to use it. Wouldn't order one again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works great and continues to give great service
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement and this fit the bill perfectly. Works great and continues to give great service! And a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: and I like the reheat and cooking sensors
customer_reviews.text: It has all I need, and I like the reheat and cooking sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and is nice and big can cook more dishes with it very convenient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quiet microwave
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. It is more powerful than our old microwave, which was a similar size, things get hotter, faster. If you do not take something out right away, it does beep, every couple minutes. Sometimes this is good, sometimes annoying. I have tried some of the sensor things, seem ok, maybe a bit hot, I tried to soften 2 sticks of butter, one was total mush.
customer_reviews.author: A mom in Nebraska

product_meta.title: SHARP Stainless Steel Carousel 1.8 Cu. Ft. 1100W Countertop Microwave Oven (ISTA 6 Packaging), Cubic Foot, 1100 Watts
product_meta.description: Sharp's extra-large family-sized 1. 8 cu. Ft. 1100W countertop microwave oven has a huge capacity to cook and reheat larger portions of food. Innovative features including a sensor cook menu, soften options, Auto defrost and the carousel turntable system make preparing your favorite foods, snacks and beverages easier. The easy-to-clean brushed Stainless Steel finish with scratch-resistant glass door complements your style. With decades of experience designing smart innovative microwaves, it’s easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust SHARP carousel.
feature_bullets: Extra-large family-sized 1. 8 Cu. Ft. Capacity microwave oven for countertop use
Easy-to-clean brushed Stainless Steel finish with scratch-resistant glass door
Removable 15-inch glass carousel turntable for even cooking
Touch control panel with blue LED display, clock, timer and child safety lock
1100 watts of power with 10 cooking power levels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
